channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The S&P 500 is now in positive territory for 2025 — live updates
Trump administration cuts an additional $450 million in grants to Harvard
item.description: The Trump administration is cutting an additional $450 million in grants to Harvard University, on top of the $2.2 billion already cut.

item.title: Crypto news: Robinhood’s Canadian deal, Coinbase’s S&P boost, eToro’s IPO plan
Chuck Schumer places hold on Trump DOJ nominees over Qatari jet
item.description: Chuck Schumer places hold on Trump DOJ nominees over Qatari jet

item.title: Trump tariffs face major legal hurdle as federal trade court hears challenge
item.description: Trump has long praised tariffs as a key tool for negotiating with other countries and collecting federal revenue.

item.title: Social Security’s cost-of-living adjustment projected to be smallest since 2021
Trump says U.S. will remove all sanctions on Syria
Trump should aim for zero tariffs. It could usher in a golden age for Americans.
Nvidia is back in the $3 trillion–market–cap club
White House announces $600 billion Saudi investment in U.S. during Trump visit
item.description: Trump's participation in the investment forum came after he signed a series of bilateral agreements with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
